data.title: Princess Claire of Belgium Biography and Replies

data.text:
Born Claire Louise on 18th January 1974 in Bath, England to Nicholas and Nicole Combs.

Parents

Nicholas Combs.

Nicole Combs.

Sibling

Joanna Combs (1972).

Matthew Combs (1976).

Education

She attended primary and secondary education at the Institut de la Providence, in Wavre.

– 1999; Studied Land Surveying and graduated as a chartered surveyor.

Engagement

Her engagement to His Royal Highness Prince Laurent of Belgium was announced on 19th December 2002.

Wedding

The couple married on 12th April 2003 in a civil ceremony in French, Dutch and German languages by Brussels Mayor Freddy Thielemans at the Brussels Town Hall and a religious ceremony by Godfried Danneels The Archbishop of Mechelen-Brussels at the Cathedral of Saint Michel and Saint Gudule in Brussels. They have three children.

Children

Princess Louise of Belgium born (Louise Sophie Mary) on 6th February 2004 at Saint-Luc University Hospital in Woluwe-Saint-Lambert.

Prince Nicolas of Belgium born (Nicolas Casimir Marie) on 13th December 2005 at Saint-Luc University Hospital in Woluwe-Saint-Lambert.

Prince Aymeric of Belgium born (Aymeric Auguste Marie) on 13th December 2005 at Saint-Luc University Hospital in Woluwe-Saint-Lambert.

Tttle

18th January 1974 – 12th April 2003; Miss Claire Combs

12th April 2003 – Present; Her Royal Highness Prince Claire of Belgium.

Replies

This slideshow requires JavaScript.

Wedding (2003)

16th Wedding Anniversary (2019)

Christmas (2019)

17th Wedding Anniversary (2020)
